entry.title: 450W Outdoor LED Parking Lot Lighting With Photocell, 5700K, AC100-277V, Universal Mount Bronze, With 20KV Surge Protector
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 944.58

Our 450W LED Shoebox lights will illuminate your outdoors with energy-efficient lighting technology. With the ability to illuminate the area with a lumen efficacy of 135 lumens per watt, this LED Pole light fixture operates on an input of 100-277 volt AC supply. Since the LED Pole light features a universal mount design, you can install it on various surfaces without compromising the aesthetics. LED Parking Lot lights are also available with motion sensors and photocells that add to energy consumption sustainability. Photocells are commonly known as LED Dusk to Dawn lights and are a popular outdoor lighting choice. This lighting fixture comes with an IP65 rating, that ensures resistivity to water and dust. The LED Pole light comes with premium-quality surface-mounted (SMD) LED chips rated for 50,000 operational hours. An aluminum alloy housing provides excellent heat sinking and sturdiness so that you can rely on this fixture for daily outdoor lighting needs. Enjoy this aesthetically pleasing LED shoebox light that comes with a warranty of five years.

entry.title: 450W LED Parking Lot Lights With Photocell, 5700K, High Voltage AC200-480V, Universal Mount Bronze, With 20KV Surge Protector
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 1017.38

If you are looking for a heavy-duty pole light to illuminate vast outdoor areas, consider this 450-watt LED fixture. This pole light fixture will operate on an input of 277-480 volt AC supply and provide an excellent output of around 60750 lumens per watt.  Since the floodlight features a universal mount design, you can install it on various surfaces, without compromising the aesthetics. It is suitable for installation on walls and mounting poles. A photocell sensor makes this light a dusk-to-dawn fixture that will turn on and off in response to the outdoor lighting conditions. An aluminum alloy housing provides excellent heat sinking and sturdiness, so you can rely on this fixture for daily outdoor lighting needs. This lighting fixture comes with an IP65 rating, so you can be sure of electrical safety in wet outdoor environments. A robust driver and 20KV surge protector maintain steady power supply, making the fixture a reliable product. The pole light comes with premium-quality surface-mounted (SMD) LED chips rated for 50,000 operational hours. It also offers a 5-year warranty. Thus, you can be sure that it will last for years to come!

The most suitable places to install these LED Area Lights are building entrances, parking lots, parkways, streets, gardens, hotel walkways, and other outdoor spaces. Pole lights of 240 Watt replace metal halide bulbs of 840 Watt and deliver superior lumen output of 34000 lumens and a CCT of 5700K. The 150W shoebox light or LED pole light from LEDMyplace is available in -- slim & sleek design, as light-weight and in bronze color. Having a beam angle of 150x85 degrees (Type III light distribution) and lumen output of 21,000 lumens, LED pole light provides for high-intensity, broad-beamed light. The color temperature of 5700K (day white color glow) is perfect for security lighting and general-purpose lighting. The aluminum housing ensures ruggedness to withstand rust or corrosion. IP65 driver makes it dust-tight and moisture-resistant to sustain harsh weather conditions. The product allows for 75-80% energy-savings when switching from any HPS or metal-halide lights. This product also comes with a photocell to prevent any unnecessary waste of energy. As a low heat generating lighting fixture, the lifespan gets extended beyond the specified 50,000 hours. An aesthetically designed luminaire, this product provides for universal mounting option. UL & DLC certified. the luminaire is eco-friendly and mercury-free. A surge protector comes as an accessory with this product to save the light from potential lightning hazards. This product is applicable for a high voltage power supply (200-480VAC).
